name: Salted Caramel Pancakes
description: Could a pancake breakfast get any better? Well, it does, once every bite is packed with sweet ’n salty caramel flavour, plus a bump of protein to keep you full and energized all morning. All you need is one scoop!

ingredients.name: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Powder Blend

preparation: In a large bowl, whisk mix with protein blend, egg, milk, 2 tbsp oil, and vanilla. Fold in chocolate chips, if using. Let batter rest 5 min; it will continue to thicken.

Heat 1 tsp oil in Sauté Pan over medium heat. Working in 2 batches and using a scant 1⁄4 cup as a guide, scoop 3–4 pancakes into pan, leaving space between them. Cook until bubbles appear on top of batter and underside is golden brown, about 3–4 min. Flip each pancake and cook until bottoms are golden brown, about 1–2 min. Repeat with remaining oil and batter.
To serve, dollop 1⁄4 cup Greek yogurt over each pancake and add toppings, if desired.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: Pancake & Waffle Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Stack ‘em up: It’s time to make the fluffiest pancakes and waffles ever! Add a few simple ingredients to this gluten free mix and griddle, flip, or press your way through an easy and delicious breakfast.

products.name: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend
summary: We like to fuel our bodies and satisfy our sweet tooth with the decadent salted caramel flavour of this pea and fava bean protein. It blends effortlessly into a morning smoothie with a creamy texture, not chalky like a lot of protein powders. It also handles the heat, so we can bake it into a batch of waffles and enjoy our day knowing that we'll have that extra boost from 20 g of plant-based protein and essential amino acids.
